subSections.title: Han character
subSections.text:
{{Han char|rn=153|rad=豸|as=05|sn=12|four=13282|canj=BHJC|ids=⿰豸穴}}

# [[weasel]]
# ancient form of [[狖]], black [[gibbon]]
<!---本意是黑色的長臂猿，又指鼬、鼠一類的動物--->
<!---1. 古同“ 狖 ”，黑色的長臂猿。
2. 鼬鼠之類的動物，能捕鼠--->
<!---taken from Baidu & Wiktionary translated; by the way, I did not previously know that any weasels ate mice, as the Chinese text indicates--->
